page.title: 08GIRL FROM A RURAL AREA
page.content: SHE LIKES LIVING IN THE COUNTRY BECAUSE IT IS PEACEFUL.SHE WOULD NOT LIKE TO LIVE IN A TOWN OR CITY AS SHE HAS BEEN BROUGHT UP IN THE COUNTRY SINCE SHE WAS A BABY. IN HER LEISURE TIME SHE IS IN THE BROWNIE GUIDES AND SHE PLAYS WITH HER FRIEND NEXT DOOR. SHE OFTEN GETS BORED. HER HOBBIES ARE READING, SWIMMING AND WALKING ALONG THE LANES AROUND HER HOUSE. SHE ALSO GOES TO CHURCH ON SUNDAY. DURING HER HOLIDAYS SHE AND HER FAMILY GO ABROAD. SHE IS TRANSPORTED BY HER PARENTS CAR. SHE HAS A YOUNGER BROTHER AND SISTER. AROUND HER HOUSE SHE HAS A GARDEN THEY HAVE NO LAND OR FIELDS. AROUND HER HOUSE SHE SEES FOXES, RABBITS, HARES AND FIELD MICE.
